dcterms:creator: US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
dcterms:description: A national system for monitoring SARS-CoV-2 concentrations in wastewater to provide insights into COVID-19 prevalence in communities.
dcterms:title: National Wastewater Surveillance System

dcterms:creator: NSW Health
dcterms:description: Weekly reports providing data on COVID-19 cases and trends in New South Wales, Australia.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 weekly surveillance reports

dcterms:creator: Massachusetts Water Resources Authority
dcterms:description: Tracking of SARS-CoV-2 concentrations in wastewater in the Boston area to monitor COVID-19 trends.
dcterms:title: Wastewater COVID-19 Tracking
